pkgmetadata.longdescription: Perform Power Analysis for the RI-CLPM and STARTS Model // Perform user-friendly power analyses for the random intercept cross-lagged panel model (RI-CLPM) and the bivariate stable trait autoregressive trait state (STARTS) model. The strategy as proposed by Mulder (2023) doi:10.1080/10705511.2022.2122467 is implemented. Extensions include the use of parameter constraints over time, bounded estimation, generation of data with skewness and kurtosis, and the option to setup the power analysis for Mplus.
